sections.heading: increase; written notice.Each tenant shall be notified in writing of any rent increase by actual notice or by United States mail at least sixty days prior to the effective date of the increase

sections.text:
76-1490.Rent increase; written notice.

Each tenant shall be notified in writing of any rent increase by actual notice or by United States mail at least sixty days prior to the effective date of the increase.

SourceLaws 1984, LB 916, ยง 41.
